question: Which Indian sportsperson has won silver at 2017 Eden World Women Snooker Championship?
explanation: Vidya Pillai from India has won silver medal in the 2017 Eden World Women Snooker Championship at Safra Toa Payoh in Singapore. With this feat, Vidya secured Indiaâ€™s first international medal in 2017. Ng On Yee from Hong Kong won gold in the Championship.
